snippet.title: DEDstress Official Trailer | Available on Steam
snippet.description:
Wishlist DEDstress on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1139760/DEDstress/
Available on Steam August 20, 2020

DEDstress is a bizarre, high-intensity, survival-horror game. Assisted by voices in your head - run, hide and bribe your way out of a strange South African mental hospital, where the staff need more help than the patients. 

Deep in the heart of Blomvanspruit, South Africa...
Daniel Vleisman is diagnosed with Disconnected Electricity Disorder, after being traumatized by constant power outages.
He wakes up in Slashbin Clinic, disoriented and with voices in his head.
He will need to maintain focus while being hunted down, using speed and stealth to make his way to freedom.

DEDstress is based on the 3-day game jam DIDstress, made by the same small indie team of two brothers. The game's stressful conditions will put your memory and wits to the test.
It should take an average of three to five hours to complete DEDstress on normal difficulty.
There is also a fast-paced infinite arcade mode as an added bonus.

3StrakGames: https://3strakgames.com/



DEDstress uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2020, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

©2020 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
